name: Daniel R. BERNSTEIN and Willy F. Groninger, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; The Hon. Robert Casey, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al., Appellees

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, J.
parties: Daniel R. BERNSTEIN and Willy F. Groninger, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; The Hon. Robert Casey, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al., Appellees.
attorneys: Frank A. Fisher, Jr., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
684 A.2d 1113
Daniel R. BERNSTEIN and Willy F. Groninger, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; The Hon. Robert Casey, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted July 20, 1993.
Decided Dec. 28, 1993.
George Bristol, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Frank A. Fisher, Jr., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, J.
